attributes.review: i had high expectations for this app - it seemed like the best app on the market! but actually it's just an app to support a piece of trash who is a terrible person in so many ways. i cant even count the amount of bad things he has done. don't get this app or else you will be supporting homophobia, racism, sexism and so much more!
attributes.title: don't get this app!!!!

attributes.review: I couldnt even open the app because it was so slow. Just a waste of time. Disappointed.
attributes.title: Slow

attributes.review: i was excited to support him but the app was honestly so bad. after i got it pictures of trump randomly started popping up on my screen. it made my phone glitch so bad and i 100% do not recommend. if you really support him why? also don’t get this app even if you do because it’s sketchy and glitchy.
attributes.title: ✨bad✨

attributes.review: This app keeps glitching. Also it’s confusing to use. It’s boring. I don’t see why anyone would download this.
attributes.title: Very glitchy

attributes.review: This app keep making my phone glitch and takes a lot of my storage space when I don’t even use a lot of storage
attributes.title: Xue hue hao piao piao piao

attributes.review: Hi I am apart of gen z but I bib not come to get the app removed but when I opened the app I was so sketch and just not what I thought it would be and I am very disappointed
attributes.title: Was a waste

attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download and when I finally opened it, it was just a picture of Donald’s face saying “oops..” and then it crashed, waste of time
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: Every time I open up this app it crashes on me. And all this app did for me was waste my time
attributes.title: This app doesn’t even work

attributes.review: after downloading the app, the smallest bit of serotonin left my body and now i have serious mental issues because of this app! ITS INSANE. NOT OKAY.
attributes.title: this app kept my serotonin hidden NOT A GEM

attributes.review: This app put me into a hypnotic state that made me forget my name and push my elderly grandmother down the stairs. I am now out of her will... do not get this app.
attributes.title: Would NOT recommend
